articles.title: Trump names Karoline Leavitt as youngest ever White House press secretary
articles.description: WEST PALM BEACH, Fla. (AP) — President-elect Donald Trump on Friday named Karoline Leavitt, his campaign press secretary, to serve as his White House press secretary.
articles.content:
WEST PALM BEACH, Fla. (AP) — President-elect Donald Trump on Friday named Karoline Leavitt, his campaign press secretary, to serve as his White House press secretary.
Leavitt, 27, currently a spokesperson for Trump's transition, would be the youngest... [2456 chars]

articles.title: Trump names Interior-designee Doug Burgum to head new White House council on energy
articles.description: President-elect Donald Trump said Friday that North Dakota Gov. Doug Burgum, Trump’s choice to head the Interior Department, will also head a newly created National Energy Council that will seek to establish U.S.
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) — President-elect Donald Trump announced Friday that North Dakota Gov. Doug Burgum, his choice to head the Interior Department, will also lead a newly created National Energy Council that will seek to establish U.S. “energy dominance”... [6101 chars]

articles.title: Zelensky says Ukraine war will end 'sooner' with Trump in office
articles.description: Kyiv, Ukraine - Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said Friday that Russia's war against his country will "end sooner" than it otherwise would have
articles.content:
Kyiv, Ukraine – Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said Friday that Russia’s war against his country will “end sooner” than it otherwise would have done once Donald Trump becomes US president next year.
“It is certain that the war will end sooner... [1049 chars]
